meanings.sent1: The stray cat looked unlovable with its matted fur.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's playful nature made it hard to see him as unlovable.
meanings.sent3: Despite its unlovable appearance, the robot was actually quite friendly.
meanings.sent4: The old, abandoned house had an unlovable charm to it.
meanings.sent5: The character in the story was written to be intentionally unlovable.

meanings.sent1: The villain's actions were so unlovable that nobody sympathized with them.
meanings.sent2: The kind-hearted nurse found it difficult to see any patient as unlovable.
meanings.sent3: The unlovable character in the movie ended up stealing the show with their humor.
meanings.sent4: The politician's unlovable behavior cost them the election.
meanings.sent5: The unlovable behavior of the main character made the book hard to put down.
